verses.verse: And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Is there yet <S%H3426><s%> any that is left <S%H3498><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>, that I may show <S%H6213><s%> him kindness <S%H2617><s%> for Jonathan <S%H3083><s%>'s sake?

And there was of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> a servant <S%H5650><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Ziba <S%H6717><s%>. And when they had called <S%H7121><s%> him unto David <S%H1732><s%>, the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H6717><s%>, Are you Ziba? And he said <S%H559><s%>, Your servant is he <S%H5650><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Is there not <S%H657><s%> yet any <S%H376><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>, that I may show <S%H6213><s%> the kindness <S%H2617><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> unto him <S%H6717><s%>? And Ziba said <S%H559><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>, Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> has yet a son <S%H1121><s%>, which is lame <S%H5223><s%> on his feet <S%H7272><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H375><s%>, Where is he <S%H6717><s%>? And Ziba said <S%H559><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>, Behold <S%H1004><s%>, he is in the house of Machir <S%H4353><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammiel <S%H5988><s%>, in Lo <S%H3810><s%>–debar.

Then king <S%H4428><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%>, and fetched <S%H3947><s%> him out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammiel <S%H5988><s%>, from Lo <S%H3810><s%>–debar.

Now when Mephibosheth <S%H4648><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jonathan <S%H3083><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>, was come <S%H935><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%>, he fell <S%H5307><s%> on his face <S%H6440><s%>, and did reverence <S%H7812><s%>. And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Mephibosheth <S%H4648><s%>. And he answered <S%H559><s%>, Behold your servant <S%H5650><s%>!

And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3372><s%>, Fear not <S%H6213><s%>: for I will surely show <S%H6213><s%> you kindness <S%H2617><s%> for Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> your father <S%H1><s%>'s sake <S%H7725><s%>, and will restore you all the land <S%H7704><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> your father <S%H1><s%>; and you shall eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> at my table <S%H7979><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>.
And he bowed <S%H7812><s%> himself <S%H559><s%>, and said, What is your servant <S%H5650><s%>, that you should look <S%H6437><s%> upon such a dead <S%H4191><s%> dog as I am <S%H3611><s%>?

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to Ziba <S%H6717><s%>, Saul <S%H7586><s%>'s servant <S%H5288><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H5414><s%>, I have given unto your master <S%H113><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%> all that pertained <S%H1961><s%> to Saul <S%H7586><s%> and to all his house <S%H1004><s%>.

You therefore <S%H1121><s%>, and your sons, and your servants <S%H5650><s%>, shall until <S%H5647><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> for him <S%H935><s%>, and you shall bring in the fruits <S%H113><s%>, that your master's son <S%H1121><s%> may have food <S%H3899><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%>: but Mephibosheth <S%H4648><s%> your master <S%H113><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> always <S%H8548><s%> at my table <S%H7979><s%>. Now Ziba <S%H6717><s%> had fifteen <S%H2568><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> Ziba <S%H6717><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%>, According to all that my lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%>, so shall your servant <S%H5650><s%> do <S%H6213><s%>. As for Mephibosheth <S%H4648><s%>, said the king <S%H398><s%>, he shall eat at my table <S%H7979><s%>, as one <S%H259><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%>.

And Mephibosheth <S%H4648><s%> had a young <S%H6996><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Micha <S%H4316><s%>. And all that lived <S%H4186><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ziba <S%H6717><s%> were servants <S%H5650><s%> unto Mephibosheth <S%H4648><s%>.

So Mephibosheth <S%H4648><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: for he did eat <S%H398><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> at the king <S%H4428><s%>'s table <S%H7979><s%>; and was lame <S%H6455><s%> on both <S%H8147><s%> his feet <S%H7272><s%>.
